definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
human excrement/night soil (human manure traditionally used as agricultural fertilizer)
to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily/crying over spilt milk/often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues
see 針尖對麥芒|针尖对麦芒[zhen1 jian1 dui4 mai4 mang2]
lit. to smash a cracked pot; fig. to treat oneself as hopeless and act crazily
lit. eye startled, mouth struck dumb (idiom); stunned/stupefied

nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])/no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices/the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart/nothing is more wretched than apathy
pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3

definition: variant of 觸霉頭|触霉头[chu4 mei2 tou2]
ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
impossible to separate/impossible to disentangle/cannot take time out
not up to it/cannot stand the test
